splitNight.notes: Never approve both 95810 and 95811 at the same time

titrationAutoApproval.notes: Only approve 95811 automatically if one of these conditions is documented

diagnosticRouting.notes: If home keywords present, map to G0399 or 95806; if lab keywords, map to 95810

pediatricRouting.notes: If patient under 18, force to pediatric CPT codes

fallback.notes: If nothing else matches, default to in-lab diagnostic PSG
